attributes.description:
Disappointed Yet Deeply Hopeful 
God’s Heart Is That You Find The One & That It Lasts Matthew 19:4-6 NIV
God’s Gives Us Wisdom In Avoiding Disappointment
Proverbs 27:12 NLT
How do I find the right person?
How do I become the right person?
How you see marriage shapes how you approach relationships. 
You don’t attract what you want; you attract what you are.
Proverbs 27:19 NLT
Clear Signs To Avoid The Wrong Person & Being The Wrong Person
When they’re not consistently pursuing Jesus.
People talk about and live out what they value most.
2 Corinthians 6:14-15 NIV 
Amos 3:3 NLT
Why You Settle & Accept Less Than You Deserve
Proverbs 27:7 NLT 
Don’t give them your heart if God doesn’t have theirs.
When those you love don’t love who you’re dating. 
Proverbs 27:9 NLT
Proverbs 12:15 NLT
When you don’t experience healthy conflict.
James 1:19-20 NIV 
Proverbs 27:14-16 NLT
When you find it difficult to trust the one you’re with.
1 Corinthians 13:7 NIV
Proverbs 27:8 NLT
Proverbs 5:15-17 NLT
When they’re leading you away from Jesus instead of closer to Jesus.
Matthew 24:4 NLT
Psalm 119:115 NLT
attributes.title: Message Title: Disappointed Yet Deeply Hopeful

attributes.content:
Please show at the beginning
Iris will welcome, read these bible verses & pray. 
Verses: 
--
”Why, my soul, are you downcast? Why so disturbed within me? Put your hope in God, for I will yet praise him, my Saviour and my God. My soul is downcast within me; therefore I will remember you from the land of the Jordan, the heights of Hermon—from Mount Mizar. Deep calls to deep in the roar of your waterfalls; all your waves and breakers have swept over me. By day the Lord directs his love, at night his song is with me— a prayer to the God of my life.
‭‭Psalms‬ ‭42‬:‭5‬-8 ‭NIV‬‬

Lead: Michelle
Harmony: Monica
Back up Melody: Iris & Jessica
--
Intro (2X = 8 bars) (Piano + Pads E)
V1 (Michelle solo)
Chorus (all-harms)
Instrumental 1 (2X = 8 bars)
V2 (all-harms)
Chorus (all-harms)
Instrumental 2 (2X = 8 bars)
Bridge 1A (1x) (All-uni)
Bridge 1A (1x) (All-harms)
Bridge 1B (2x) (All-harms)
Chorus: (all-harms)
End on: E

During the instrumental before the bridge:
”May my prayer be set before you like incense; may the lifting up of my hands be like the evening sacrifice.“
‭‭Psalms‬ ‭141‬:‭2‬ ‭NIV‬‬

Lead: Iris
Harmony: Monica 
Back up melody: Michelle & Jess
---
Start Pads: B 
(Worthy) Chorus 1A (1X) (Iris solo)
(Worthy) Chorus 1A (1X) (all-uni)
(Worthy) Chorus 1A (3X) (all-harms)
(Exalt) Chorus 1 (2X) (all-harms)
(Worthy) Chorus 1A (1X) (all-harms) 
(Worthy) Instrumental 
(Worthy) Bridge (1X) (all-uni)
(Worthy) Bridge (1X) (all-harms)
(Worthy) Chorus 1A (2X) (all-harms) 
(Exalt) Chorus 1 (1X) (all-harms) 
(Exalt) Chorus 1 (1X) (JTV + drums)
(Exalt) Chorus 1 (1X) (all-harms) 
(Exalt) Chorus 1 (2X) instruments only
End on: B

Lead: Monica
Harmony: Michelle
Back up melody: Iris & Jess
---
V1 (Monica solo)
Chorus (all-harms)
Instrumental (4 bars) Oh...
V2 (all-harms)
Chorus (all-harms)
Bridge 1(1x) (All-harms)
Bridge 2 (2x) (Monica-solo)
Bridge 2 (2x) (all-harms)
Instrumental (4 bars) Oh... (3X)
Chorus (1x) (JTV then build)
Chorus (1x) (all-harms) (2nd ending) End on: F

During the first Instrumental before the bridge:
--
”Jesus Christ is the same yesterday and today and forever.“
‭‭Hebrews‬ ‭13‬:‭8‬ ‭NIV

Lead: Iris
Harmony: Monica
Back up melody: Michelle & Jess
---
V1 (Iris solo)
Chorus (all-uni)
V2 (all-uni)
Chorus (all-harms) (2X)
Instrumental (Iris will speak so loop until she says “let’s sing this next part together”)
Bridge 1(Michelle-solo, lower octave, 1st 2 lines)(all in, unison for the rest)
Bridge 2 (all-harms)
Chorus (all-harms) (2X)
Instrumental (Iris will guide and cue)
Bridge 3 (all-harms)
Chorus (all-harms) (2X)
Verse 3 (all-uni)
Tag (all-uni)
